title: Can lol change this AFK settings?

replies.body: The lower priority queue offers a chance to pick up what would have otherwise been another connection issue or leave.  It's really important to take this moment to troubleshoot whatever is causing this and stick to custom games for now.  The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system is going to treat the leave equally regardless of intent because it still causes others a poor experience.  Feel free to toss me more details on the issue itself, would love to help troubleshoot!
